title: Adding numbers in R
text:
To add numbers in R use +

1 + 1

[1] 2

title: Welcome!
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: Multiplying numbers in R
text:
To multiply numbers in R use *

library(moments)

x_kurtosis = c()
for (i in 1:100) {
  x_norm = rnorm(1000)
  x_kurtosis[i] = kurtosis(x_norm)
  
}

plot(x_kurtosis,type="o",ylab = "Kurtosis",pch=16)
abline(h=3,col="red",lwd=2)




Kurtosis of a standard Normal distribution
